title: Gosford Estate Walks

images.title: Lauralu68 / CC BY-SA (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0)
images.caption: Gosford House, Gosford estate (Aberlady Longniddry, Scotland)

images.title: Renata Edge / Gosford Wemyss Estate gatehouse
images.caption: Gosford Wemyss Estate gatehouse. The gates of the Wemyss and March Estate's Gosford Policies, on the A 198 at Longniddry

images.title: Richard Webb / Gosford Sands
images.caption: Gosford Sands. Just to the west of the estate there are walks along the beach with views over Gosford Bay. Notice the tree canopy slanting upwards under the effect of the wind. The wall surrounding Gosford House can be seen beside the road.

images.title: Mausoleum, Gosford by Callum Black, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Mausoleum, Gosford

description: The Gosford Estate is located near to Longniddry in East Lothian. The grounds have some lovely walking trails which you can explore by buying a permit from the Wemyss and March estate office or from the Gosford Bothy Farm Shop. See the link below for full details of their walking policies. In the park you'll find some lovely gardens, a pretty lake and some fine architecture including the Mausoleum and the gatehouse. The house itself is an imposing neo-classical mansion surrounded by 5000 acres of parkland and coast. It's located on the south side of the Firth of Forth and close to the famous golf course at Muirfield.
